person.persName: James Preston Bates (Barren Co, Ky, attorney, postmaster, and prov govt)

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, attorney, postmaster, and politician. Grayson County, Virginia, native. Married to Harriet Barrick Bates in Barren County in January 1834. Father of Virginia Bates, William Bates, James Bates, John Bates, George Bates, Edward Bates, and Frank Bates. Attorney in Barren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Postmaster at Glasgow from April 3, 1858 to September 6, 1859. Resident in Barren County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government at Russellville in November 1861. Elected member of the Council of Ten for the provisional government. Chairman of the Ways and Means Committee for the provisional government of Kentucky. Member of the Committee on Military Affairs for the provisional government of Kentucky.
